column4: mrdos: use the livecd, get a shell, mkdir /tmp/root-partition; mount the root partition on /tmp/root-partition; mount the other mount points (/boot, /tmp, and so on) and eventually "chroot /tmp/root-partition /bin/bash"
Ahead of you there with the logs, although I can't see what actually happened
because today's the 15th, and everything was alright on the 14th, no?
I wish I could agree, but the machine's been turned on/off pretty much daily
